title: Classic Mojito
ingredients: Lime wedge and mint sprig for garnish
procedure: In a sturdy glass, muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour in the white rum.
Top with club soda and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge and a sprig of mint.
Serve immediately and enjoy.

title: Mango Lassi
ingredients: Pinch of cardamom or mint leaf (for garnish)
procedure: Combine mango pulp, yogurt, milk, and sugar in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
If the lassi is too thick, add a little more milk and blend again.
Pour into tall glasses.
Garnish with a pinch of cardamom or a mint leaf.
Serve chilled.

title: Iced Coffee
procedure: Brew strong coffee and let it cool to room temperature.
Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour the cooled coffee over the ice.
Add milk or cream to your liking.
Stir in sugar or your preferred sweetener until dissolved.
Serve immediately for a refreshing boost.

title: Fresh Lemonade
procedure: Juice the lemons to get fresh lemon juice.
In a large pitcher, combine the lemon juice and cold water.
Add sugar and stir vigorously until it completely dissolves.
Taste and adjust sweetness if necessary.
Add ice cubes and lemon slices to the pitcher.
Serve chilled in glasses.

title: Green Smoothie
ingredients: Optional: 1 scoop protein powder or 1 tbsp chia seeds
procedure: Place spinach, banana, and almond milk in a blender.
Add a spoonful of honey or maple syrup for sweetness.
You can also add a scoop of protein powder or chia seeds for an extra boost.
Blend on high speed until everything is smooth and well combined.
Pour into a glass.
Enjoy this healthy and energizing drink right away.
